returns.funcs: The function selectors implemented by the facet.

returns.interfaces: The interface IDs implemented by the facet.

facetMetadata().details: Exposed to allow for single call retrieval of all facet metadata.

returns.functions: The function selectors implemented by the facet.
returns.interfaces: The interface IDs implemented by the facet.
returns.name: The name of the facet.

params.query: Address for which to query authorization as an operator.

returns._0: Boolean indicating if query is authorized as an operator

params.func: Function selector for which to query operator authorization.
params.query: Account for which to query authorization to call `func`.

params.approval: Authorization status to set for newOperator.
params.newOperator: Address for which to change authorization.

params.func: Function selector for which to update authorization of `newOperator`.
params.newOperator: Account for which to update authorization to call `func`.

facetFuncs().notice: Declares the function selectors implemented by the exposing facet for use in a composing proxy.

facetInterfaces().notice: Declares the interfaces implemented by the exposing facet for use in a composing proxy.

facetMetadata().notice: Declares comprehensive metadata about the exposing facet.

facetName().notice: Declares a canonical nonunique name for the exposing facet.
